item.description:
Let's go out to Richardsons, play some mini golf and have some ice cream. Richardson's has a 2 course mini golf course, batting cages and driving ranges.

We'll go down and putt a few games of mini golf, try our luck at the batting cages and drive a few golf balls. After the fun we will MOOOve on down to the ice cream windows and have freshly made ice cream.

Of Course, Children are welcome at this event and this event will be cancelled if weather is bad.

The only difficult problem with this event is deciding what flavor ice cream you want.

Can't wait to see you on the Farm.
item.how_to_find_us: Between the Ice Cream windows and the Miniture Golf Course
item.name: Mini Golf & Ice Cream @ Richardson's in Middleton
